ground_truth.thought: 提供一些投资规划的建议
ground_truth.name: PolygonFinance.provide_investment_advice

origin_prompt.content:
你是一个可以使用外部工具的助手。你可以调用以下的工具:
[{'name': 'BINGMap.get_coordinates', 'description': 'Get the coordinates of a location.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'location', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the location need to get coordinates.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'latitude', 'description': 'the latitude of the location.'}, {'name': 'longitude', 'description': 'the longitude of the location.'}]}, {'name': 'GoogleScholar.get_citation_format', 'description': "get APA citation format by an identification of organic result's id", 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'q', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'ID of an individual Google Scholar organic search result'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'citation', 'description': 'the citation format of the article'}]}, {'name': 'BINGMap.search_nearby', 'description': 'Search for places nearby a location, within a given radius, and return the results into a list. Put the location name at the end of the query.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'search_term', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the place name'}], 'optional_parameters': [{'name': 'places', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the name of the location.'}, {'name': 'latitude', 'type': 'FLOAT', 'description': 'the latitude of the location.'}, {'name': 'longitude', 'type': 'FLOAT', 'description': 'the longitude of the location.'}, {'name': 'radius', 'type': 'NUMBER', 'description': 'radius in meters.'}], 'return_data': [{'name': 'places', 'description': 'the list of places, each place is a dict with name and address, at most 5 places.'}]}, {'name': 'PolygonFinance.get_ticker_detail', 'description': 'Get a single ticker supported by Polygon.io, with detailed information about the ticker and the company behind it', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'ticker', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': ''}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'address', 'description': 'company address'}, {'name': 'homepage_url', 'description': ''}, {'name': 'description', 'description': 'A description of the company and what they do/offer'}, {'name': 'list_date', 'description': 'The date that the symbol was first publicly listed'}, {'name': 'name', 'description': 'The name of the asset'}]}, {'name': 'PolygonFinance.search_stock_ticker', 'description': 'get the stock ticker given the company name', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'search', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'search for terms within the ticker and/or company name'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'ticker', 'description': 'The exchange symbol that this item is traded under'}, {'name': 'name', 'description': 'The name of the asset'}]}, {'name': 'PolygonFinance.get_market_overview', 'description': 'Get an overview of the current market opportunities, including key sectors and potential growth areas.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'q', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'Type of market overview requested'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'overview', 'description': 'A summary of the current market opportunities'}]}]
如果你已经知道答案，请调用FinishAction来提供最终的回复。
我想了解如何通过合理的投资规划来增加我的财富。首先，获取当前市场的投资机会介绍。然后，获取一些常见的投资规划工具或服务的推荐。接着，分析我的投资目标和风险承受能力，找出适合的投资规划。最后，提供一些投资规划的建议。
获取当前市场的投资机会介绍
当前这一步要调用的工具名称是什么?
PolygonFinance.get_market_overview
当前工具的参数'q'的值是什么?
market_overview
{'overview': '当前市场主要机会集中在科技、医疗和可再生能源领域。科技股显示出强劲的增长潜力，医疗行业受益于人口老龄化和创新药物的研发，可再生能源则受到政策支持和环保意识的推动。'}

接下来要调用的工具的参数为：{'overview': '当前市场主要机会集中在科技、医疗和可再生能源领域。科技股显示出强劲的增长潜力，医疗行业受益于人口老龄化和创新药物的研发，可再生能源则受到政策支持和环保意识的推动。'}
请回答以下问题：当前这一步的目标是什么?
获取一些常见的投资规划工具或服务的推荐
当前这一步要调用的工具名称是什么?
PolygonFinance.get_investment_tools
当前工具的参数'q'的值是什么?
investment_tools
{'tools': ['Robo-Advisors', 'Mutual Funds', 'ETFs', 'Real Estate Investment Trusts (REITs)']}

接下来要调用的工具的参数为：{'tools': ['Robo-Advisors', 'Mutual Funds', 'ETFs', 'Real Estate Investment Trusts (REITs)']}
请回答以下问题：当前这一步的目标是什么?
分析我的投资目标和风险承受能力，找出适合的投资规划
当前这一步要调用的工具名称是什么?
PolygonFinance.analyze_investment_profile
当前工具的参数'profile'的值是什么?
user_profile
{'profile': {'investment_goal': 'wealth_growth', 'risk_tolerance': 'moderate', 'suitable_investments': ['ETFs', 'Mutual Funds', 'Real Estate Investment Trusts (REITs)']}}

接下来要调用的工具的参数为：{'profile': {'investment_goal': 'wealth_growth', 'risk_tolerance': 'moderate', 'suitable_investments': ['ETFs', 'Mutual Funds', 'Real Estate Investment Trusts (REITs)']}}
